param.name: USER
param.label: User
param.description: User name - Can be overriden on a per-user basis (see users 'Personal Data' tab)

param.name: PASS
param.label: Password
param.description: User password - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.

param.name: USE_SESSION_CREDENTIALS
param.label: Session credentials
param.description: Try to use the current AjaXplorer user credentials for connecting. Warning, the AJXP_SESSION_SET_CREDENTIALS config must be set to true!

param.name: AJXP_SLUG
param.label: Alias
param.description: Alias for replacing the generated unique id of the repository

param.name: RECYCLE_BIN
param.label: Recycle Bin Folder
param.description: Leave empty if you do not want to use a recycle bin.

param.name: DEFAULT_RIGHTS
param.label: Default Rights
param.description: This right pattern (empty, r, or rw) will be applied at user creation for this repository.

param.name: CHARSET
param.label: Character Encoding
param.description: If your server does not set correctly its charset, it can be good to specify it here manually.

param.name: PAGINATION_THRESHOLD
param.label: Pagination Threshold
param.description: When a folder will contain more items than this number, display will switch to pagination mode, for better performances.

param.name: PAGINATION_NUMBER
param.label: #Items per page
param.description: Once in pagination mode, number of items to display per page.
